tasks.all: deno fmt && deno lint --fix && (deno check & deno publish --dry-run --allow-dirty & deno task test) && echo 'Available dependency bumps:' && deno task bump-deps:list
tasks.test: rm -rf coverage && deno test --parallel --coverage && deno coverage --lcov --output=coverage/lcov.info
tasks.release: deno task release:ready-to-start && deno task release:commit && deno task release:tag && deno task release:push
tasks.release:ready-to-start: deno task git-is-clean && deno task all && deno task git-is-clean && deno publish --dry-run
tasks.release:push: git push origin main $(deno task version)
tasks.release:commit: deno --allow-all npm:fork-version@1.7.6 --changelog-all --tag-prefix='' --skip-tag && deno fmt CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit
